review_text: Loved everything! Professional and quick to respond to any questions. We will be back and highly recommend it to others!
nice cabin great host
We enjoyed our stay! It was a great location, very close to everything. Also very clean!
perfect place highly recommended
Beautiful! We enjoyed our stay and it was so close to everything!
Great stay.
Great host, very responsive
this is a great spot to stay when you are planning to do any Pigeon forge or Gatlinburg activities!

This was our first ever Airbnb stay , it was exactly what we were looking for, in a getaway. Within 15 minutes from everything we had interest in doing. The condo was very very clean ! We had no issues when entering into the condo, and the public parking was within perfect distance to take our luggage to and from. I will be staying with Samantha when we return to the mountains again. She made us feel very welcome.!

This place was truly a hidden gem. It was very private and safe. It’s out of the hustle and bustle of Pigeon Forge, but within a 5 to 10 minute drive of everything you would want to do in Pigeon Forge, or drive a little further to get to Gatlinburg. Right in the heart of walkable downtown Sevierville. You can walk right up to the Dolly Parton statue. It was a great location where we felt safe and right at home. Loved Trotter’s BBQ (just a block away)! We had everything we needed and our host was very responsive. We would definitely stay with Samantha again.
Location is perfect! Road it not busy. Easy parking.
Very clean and exactly as advertised. Had everything needed for a great stay.

We were in town for a Dance Competition. The loft condo was everything described and more. It was very clean and decorated nicely. The location was perfect. Samantha was very helpful at booking and check-in and check-out. We enjoyed our stay very much and look forward to staying again in the future.
This was an amazing place to stay and a great price compared to others nearby. I will definitely be coming back!

My mom and I had a wonderful stay at this little loft! It was super clean and appreciated all the touches to make us comfortable. The bed was super cozy and the loft is in a great location, short drive to all the attractions in pigeon forge! Highly recommend!

This is a great place to stay if you want to be close to everything in the area, but out of the direct hustle and bustle. The condo was clean and beautifully decorated, and we appreciated the ceiling fans! There are a few restaurants within walking distance, and we especially liked Graze Burgers!
We had a great time, the condo was a clean, great place to stay, and a good location.
Super comfortable, clean, great location, and many thoughtful details. 100% recommended

The condo was spotless and just as listed. It is located near everything and very peaceful and quiet. Samantha responded very quickly and was able to answer all questions within minutes. I highly recommend staying here.

This was our first experience with an Airbnb. It did not disappoint. Great location…convenient to everything we wanted to do. The condo was clean and just the right amount of space for us. Highly recommend!!!
Beautiful and clean apartment! Samantha was wonderful! Thank you for sharing your space with us!
This was my 1st time using an airbnb, And I had a wonderful experience! Would highly recommend this listing for anyone looking for a private, clean & stylish stay.

It was a peaceful, unstressful location. The place was close to everything we wanted to do!
Samantha was very responsive! would highly recommend

My wife and I could not have been happier with our stay at Samantha's place. The location is great. The parking is easy and getting in and out of the apt was a breeze. There are restaurants within easy walking distance and access to the major highways are just blocks away. The place is spic and span and best of all (in my opinion) it is church-mouse quiet. We felt comfortable and right at home our entire stay. This place is why we love using Airbnb. I don't think we would stay anywhere else if we come back to Sevierville!

This is a beautiful place to stay! It is clean and new. The kitchen is well-stocked with everything needed to prepare meals or just a quick snack. The view is amazing and looks like a movie set. The attention to detail in the decor feels just like home. I stay at a lot of Airbnb's for travel and this is by far one of my favorites.

Adorable little condo in downtown Sevierville Tennessee. The condo was very clean, decorated so cute, stocked with all amenities needed for a great stay in the mountains. We was surrounded by all kind of places to eat, shop or go to a show.
We enjoyed our time at the condo and will
Be back.
our stay was awesome. good location.
Amazing place to stay! No more than 15 minutes from Pigeon Forge, so it’s pretty close to everything! Beautiful and quiet condo in downtown! We will absolutely be staying here again!
Like new, very nice accommodations. Very spacious. well thought out.

This is the cutest place to stay! The condo is decorated beautifully and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. The location is perfect and within walking distance of several restaurants, retail shops, and tourist attractions. This condo would be great for couples celebrating a honeymoon or anniversary!

Great place in the heart of downtown Sevierville with walkability to many shops and restaurants. The condo was clean and stocked with necessities such as snacks, water and coffee to get you started. We will be back to this place.
The cutest Airbnb! Perfect location to pigeon forge & Dollywood! We had a blast. Samantha’s place is so clean & comfy! We will definitely be back! Cannot recommended more.
Very nice, upscale condo!

We had a wonderful time at Samantha’s place. It’s well decorated and central to cute restaurants and a great coffee shop! Close to Pigeon Forge, Gatlinburg, and the mountains, we couldn’t have asked for a better place! We will definitely be back!

Wonderful spot on the cutest street in downtown Sevierville! We could see the Dolly statue out our balcony windows! Beautifully decorated, immaculately clean, wonderful communication. Parking was always available and a breeze. Would definitely recommend.
Beautiful place and such a quaint location in Servierville. Was close to Knoxville, Pigeon Forge, and Gatlinburg. Lots of thing nearby and was a very quiet!
We had a wonderful stay in this beautifully decorated centralized apartment.

The area was amazing and had a great view of downtown. The condo was very pretty and I love the decorations and how the place was put together. Very easy getting to the place, instructions were very clear. We only had a problem with parking but the hosts did fix that problem for us so that was a huge bonus as well. Overall, a great place to come stay at and definitely recommend for anyone.
We loved it

We stayed at this lovely cabin for 5 nights. It is brand new and has everything we needed for a comfortable stay - a fully stocked kitchen, an indoor pool, and comfy furniture. However, it was missing curtains for all the windows. Our kids woke up at 6 am the first morning due to the sunlight streaming in. We contacted Samuel, and he promptly arranged for curtains to be installed in one of the bedrooms and one bathroom. They are working on getting window coverings for all the rooms, but it's best to double-check before booking if you need to use all the bedrooms.
Otherwise, this place was great, and would absolutely book again!
Felt like home!
Super clean. Beautiful property and great location.
We really enjoyed the place, new and very clean.

Great place to stay to visit Knoxville and Surroundings
Samuel was great and place was brand new, I will definitely stay here again when visiting the mountains!

We absolutely loved our stay and didn’t want to leave. The private indoor pool was such a fun experience. Hot tub was very nice. The view from the living room and deck was serene and a beautiful slice of the mountains. We got to see a pair of pileated woodpeckers in the trees.
The deck furniture is quality and tasteful - as are all the furnishings in the home. We enjoyed meals on the back deck and really loved the hanging egg chairs on the front deck (so comfortable!). This is a new neighborhood and homes are still being built up the road, but we did not have interruptions and all the crews working up the street are quiet and respectful.
The kitchen is well stocked for any cooking/baking and has a Keurig. We appreciated the starter pods, as we didn’t think to ask the type of coffee maker. There was a tea kettle, as well.
The beds were great, internet was very good, showers were fantastic. Samuel is a great host and very responsive. We would love to stay again. Thank you!

Book Now! You won’t be disappointed. Awesome, family-friendly accommodations. Beautiful new place, lots of windows — just like the description. Great area, lots to see, explore and do! Or, stay-in and enjoy relaxing in the hot tub, fireside or taking a swim in the pool. The kids loved the kid-cave, old school arcade games and shuffleboard table! Already planning our next adventure!!
We had an amazing time at this accommodation. It definitely exceeded one expectations and we will definitely recommend it to friends and family.

This place is very clean and faces beautiful wooded hills. We loved staying here. Samuel was really helpful with recommendations on where to eat in the area and helpful directions on how to get to the cabin. What a great experience!

If heaven on earth was a place THIS WOULD BE IT. Modern luxury with the Great Smokies feel. The home was beautiful and as described. Literally HOME AWAY FROM HOME.
The beds were extremely comfortable which is very unusual.
The pool and all amenities were new and fully functional.
If you’re looking to come in and cook there were plenty of cookware and cutlery available.
Sam was an amazing host who responded promptly to any questions and request.
The location is close to all of the action yet tucked away for a nice and peaceful slumber.
I will be back soon.
Great place to stay definitely recommend!!!! 5 out of 5 stars!
This house was beyond amazing - the views, the decor, it had it all. I would go back for sure! Samuel was extremely responsive and helpful. We had an amazing weekend and were sad to leave.

Beautiful location. Wonderful home. Could not have been happier. We were coming to town for the convention center and our hotel was less than adequate. We found this house and will never stay in a hotel again. Clean. Beautifully decorated. Easy to find. Beds were great. Pool a big hit. Will stay again.

Overall a great stay!
Cool, new subdivision being built, it has a resort vibe to it. The new subdivision was active with construction during my stay. However this was not an issue in the slightest and does not warrant any star deductions as this is out of the owners control. It was noticable that the house was freshly built. I noticed a couple things here and there that should have been addressed by the builders, but these items didn't take away from my experience, you'd only see them if you knew what to look for. I was working long hours for this business trip and didn't get to enjoy any of the numerous amenities, I wish I had time, I specifically picked this place for the shuffle board! Having said that, everything I used worked great and I enjoyed my stay. It definitely has potential and should be even more amazing once the subdivision is finished! I'm confident it will be a popular place during the summer with a water park extremely close, you have to pass it to get the house!
We had a great time and Samuel was wonderful to work with us.
Rented for a week! Beautiful house! Samuel was very helpful, nice and responsive! Easy to get into. The pool and hot tub were awesome! We will absolutely be back!

Samuel was absolutely incredible to work with! This home is gorgeous too. The moment you step in the door it smelled so nice and it is pristine. It’s so wonderful to stay in a place that is absolutely spotless. There’s so much room in this home! We loved playing shuffleboard everyday and playing in the indoor pool, what a treat!! The kitchen is stocked perfectly with everything you need. The water and ice from the fridge tasted great too! We loved it here and look forward to coming back!
Beautiful property in a convenient location short drive to all attractions. Samuel was a great host communicative and friendly. Would definitely consider staying here again.

What a beautiful spot in a gorgeous new home! Having a place with our own private pool and hot tub away from the hustle and bustle from the local attractions was the perfect peaceful retreat after a day on the town. We also enjoyed the bunk room for the kids and dinner on the upper deck with beautiful sunset views!
SO much fun with the pool and the hot tub on the same level! Indoor pool was perfect for the kids. House was pristine and appreciated that it had everything we needed to be comfortable!

Sam was a great Host! He was always responsive and accommodating. This house is beautiful and in a great location to get to all things. The indoor pool and hot tub were very nice after hiking the Smokey Mountains National Park. Would definitely recommend this place.

Brought my family for Easter weekend. My kids loved the pool and the adults loved the hot tub! Place is gorgeous and looks brand new! Hosts are super kind, responsive, helpful and inviting! I would return to this home.
This is a new build in a new neighborhood.

We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful home. It was brand new - we loved that everything was so clean and the house was very well decorated & furnished. There was an issue with the hot water but Samuel was responsive and had it fixed before our stay was over. Since it was brand new there were no window treatments which I wish we knew about beforehand - as we had young kids with us. But the views were beyond amazing and the house was a joy to stay at. Watching the sunset from the balcony did not disappoint. I look forward to going back again. Samuel was a great host and always got back to me within a few hours. Our family loved our weekend here.
Beautiful new build to make for a perfect getaway. Spend 5 days with my family and parents. From ages 9 to 68, we all enjoyed the location.

Pros -
Beautiful place, lots of bedrooms
Pool to yourself (has a lock with a code too)
Hot tub was nice
Good location
Cons-
All in all, it was rushed to rental. It was easy to see that the home hadn't been stayed in previously. Some of the easily resolved issues were - pool door handle coming off, missing mirror in basement bathroom, no trash can in master bath, no window covers anywhere (issue when there's a large window over the master toilet and the hot tub is right outside the bunk room), the furnace wasn't turned on yet so we had no AC for a night, the water never gets hot in the basement or master shower, no wax for the shuffle board table, mud I'm the decks and in the pool area, no garbage cans to take out the trash to. All of these are easily fixed but the only one that they sent someone out for was the AC. There wasnt an offer for us to have anything refunded for the night without AC. If little issues had been tended to I would give 5 stars.

We absolutely loved our stay! The cabin was spotless and felt like home. It was nice and private and close to all the things we wanted to do. It was also fun to just stay in! Everything we could possibly need was provided! Chargers, shampoo, body wash, conditioner, spices, beach towels, etc. We were really able to just relax and enjoy our time there. We really loved the movie room and the hot tub was aaaamazing!! We will definitely be staying here again!

Boyfriend and I stayed here for our first vacation together for my birthday. We loved it. It’s not far from all the local tourist spots and the drive up was beautiful. Hot tub, pool table, and theater room were great additions that we really enjoyed. It is very quiet and peaceful. Jaynee was very helpful and responsive. She even checked in on us during our stay. It was clean and we loved every bit of it. If you’re thinking about staying here do it! You won’t regret it.

Great place. Great host. Very clean. Very quiet.
Would stay here again 1000%
Me and my wife had a kids feee trip for our anniversary. Great time.

Loved the cabin. Great secluded location away from the hustle and bustle of the main touristy area. Great location for visiting daughter at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville. On the way make sure to stop at Ye Olde Steakhouse for the best Prime Rib ever.
Beautiful place with great directions
This cabin was a great spot for a weekend getaway! My wife and I loved the cabin and all the furnishings it offered. We will definitely be booking again! I highly recommend!
My husband and I absolutely loved the cabin! It was exactly what it looked in the photos. We would definitely stay again!!

We booked Jaynee's cabin for my 40th birthday. It was an amazing experience from beginning to end. The hot tub and theater room were fun and relaxing. The kitchen had everything we could have needed and was spacious. Blankets and little extras made it feel extra special. Perfect for a getaway for 2 to connect and have a romantic adventure.
This was a mid week, few day getaway surprise for my husband & I lucked up & found this cabin - that Exceeded our expectations!

The cabin was beautiful and clean! The perfect place for a relaxing getaway! The location is far enough from the traffic and busy areas to be relaxing, but close enough to the “busy areas” where it doesn’t feel like a hassle to get out. Jaynee was super helpful, checked in on us throughout our stay, and responded quick. We definitely recommend this place & hope to be back!
Loved my stay will be back

Jaynee's cabin was everything that was advertised! It was exactly what my husband and I needed to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Clean, peaceful, and private with just enough amenities that we didn't have to leave the entire stay! We will definitely be coming back to celebrate more anniversaries!

This was a beautiful and unique cabin which provided us the privacy and quiet that we needed for our romantic get away! It was still easy to get into Pigeon Forge and the Smoky Mountain national Park! The hot tub felt so good, and the cabin is well stocked. Loved the theatre room, Pac Man Game and Pool table. We will definitely stay here again!

We stayed here for our anniversary. It was perfect! Exactly as described and the pictures. It was beautifully decorated and extremely peaceful! Clean w/ lots to do if you want to stay in and not far from all of the attractions and sites! Highly recommend!
Beautiful cabin some much need rest and relaxation for the family
We really enjoyed our stay, look forward to coming back soon!
Jaynee was quickly responsive and accurately described the cabin! My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our weekend getaway for Valentine’s Day and would recommend this place and Jaynee to anyone!

Always very responsive ￼
Checked in with us
Cute place
We had a blast
Good customer service and very clean house

We absolutely loved this stay!!! It’s was perfect for us. It was super cozy and we never got bored. Hot tub is super clean, unlike others we’ve seen. We loved that it was private as well. I would definitely give it a try!!!!

The space was exactly what was listed, if not even more beautiful than the pictures! Jaynee was very responsive and even helped us out tremendously when we had an issue with something immediately! The location was superb and the serenity was just like I expected. The hot tub was very clean, as were the bathrooms and bedroom. If you are looking for place in this area you can not go wrong with this cabin! Absolutely wonderful and will be visiting again! 10/10!

We enjoyed our stay in the cabin with all the wonderful amenities especially the popcorn maker. The cabin is very inviting and has a cozy feeling. It is beautiful and looks just like the pictures. Jaynee, the host is very personable and responsive. We asked to check in early since they were expecting snow that evening and was able to accommodate which was very appreciative since we are from Florida. We will definitely be back.

This was the first air bnb i’ve ever booked and it was so easy! My boyfriend and I stayed for the night due to him leaving for deployment soon and we enjoyed it so much! The location was very private and our favorite part was the hot tub. My boyfriend said “we have to get a house like this”:)

My boyfriend and I came up for a few days to celebrate our birthdays and spend some time alone and had the best time! The pool table, hot tub and pac man machine were definitely put to come use while we were there. Very clean and well taken care of place, quiet and peaceful. We will for sure be back! 10/10 experience!

The place was lovely! The pictures are up to date, it’s a brand new cabin the communication was great, any questions I had they were answered. I loved everything about the cabin it was cozy the sound system was terrific, the place looks exactly like the pictures, it still has the brand new home smell. The location was very peaceful I had 0 problems! Definitely will be booking again!
Thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. Cabin is perfect and simple for a weekend getaway. Place is very clean and very roomy. Surprisingly close to town which made a coffee and breakfast run super easy

We absolutely enjoyed our stay and it was the perfect place to ring in the New Year! Everything in the cabin is new, clean and beautiful. We enjoyed relaxing in the hot tub and loved the reclining seats and popcorn maker in the theater room! The owners were very responsive. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a romantic couples getaway! Will be booking here again!
Enjoyed all the extras-hiking, boating, fishing, fire pit. Well furnished cabin.
Great place to stay if you are just looking for something peaceful and quiet . Super clean and responsive host!

Marcel’s place was absolutely perfect. Just as the pictures looked and it was super clean and private. The location was super convenient and was easy to find. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely return.
the perfect place for a getaway. secluded but close to everything!

We had a great time in the cabin. It was beautiful clean and has a gorgeous view.
Cabin is luxurious and modern with all of the amenities. Would love to come back.
The perfect mix of modern amenities in a rustic setting. Marcel was a great host and was quick to respond for any needs!

This cabin was beyond my expectations, from the moment we pulled up and enter the cabin. I will definitely be returning.
The morning view, paddle boats, the coziness. I regretted leaving. In fact, today I’ve recommended this spot to one of my husband’s friend who is a judge for him & his wife.
Theresa
If I could give more stars I would. Highly recommended!
Perfect place for a peaceful getaway and still close enough for city activities.
The place was absolutely beautiful, clean and well constructed. My husband and I felt right at home.

Our stay here was simply AMAZING! My gf and I needed a mini getaway and it was everything we could ask for and more. Sadly it rained so we couldn’t enjoy the outdoor amenities but the home was definitely enough. I’m still amazed with how clean and modern everything is. We are already planning our trip back just to stay here again!
Only con was how flat the pillows were in the bed but if you bring your own pillows, it won’t be an issue! Everything else was PERFECT!

Such a cozy, cute retreat! We loved the dock, pedal boats, and sitting on the back deck! Bed was super comfortable and we loved having the Bluetooth to play music. So many great details that made our stay perfect!

We made so many memories at the green triangle house! We came for Dollywood but I loved our time spent at the rental more than anything. My 4 and 5 year old loved it; we used every amenity offered. We were all sad to leave and would not hesitate to come back!
This air bnb was beautiful and provided everything for the perfect family vacation
This place is so lovely. Marcel was so helpful and kind. Cannot recommend it enough. We hope to be back soon. One of our favorite stays.

Let me start off by saying the pictures, is the exact same as the place. The house was so peaceful and it’s felt like home. Marcels instructions were perfect. Nothing was out of place, everything was great.

A great place that feels like the woods but right out of town. Everything is new, clean, beautifully done. Great view of the water. Private firepit. Well maintained grounds and every detail thought of. Highly recommend!

This was my first experience with Airbnb and I’m so glad that, Marcel made my first adventure a great one! He responded back right away, was helpful and friendly.
Everything was clean, organized and beautiful. Everything looked exactly like the pictures.
Added bonus: The place is near everything in town just tucked away to give you that added peacefulness/privacy and you don’t have any of the local traffic noise. So any errands or food/gas runs are effortless.
If I was to ever travel back to this area I would 100% be going back to the Retreat Oasis.
Awesome new homes. Great, private and friendly vibe. Thanks!

Just book it! We wanted to be secluded, but close enough to go do all the fun things and this was perfect! We drove into pigeon forge several times a day to go eat, shop and what not; then we would come back and walk the beautiful trails on the property! The kids loved fishing and pedal boating! Truly the perfect balance. We always look for unique luxury places to stay and this one is one of our new favorites! Marcel was a super awesome host! Beautifully lit up at night!! Truly a 5 star property!

This place is worth every penny you spend. Everything was perfect, the surrounding nature with the lake along with the actual place which was elegant and cozy. We wish to travel and stay here again in the future.
This is a well maintained property and is presented beyond my expectations. Nice job Marcel
The place was beautiful! Definitely worth visiting!
Really enjoyed our stay at this place, thanks Marcel! :)
Amazing place, Marcel was proactive, and very responsive, for sure coming back soon! 🔥🔥

This place was very nice from beginning to end. I had a few questions for Marcel during the trip and he always responded quickly. It’s very calm and peaceful here. I’ll definitely be returning in the future.
This was a awesome gateway place! Definitely going to return!

Unique. Peaceful. Charming.
I absolutely adore this place. It is quiet, serene AND close to everything. That is very unusual. The place is so clean and had everything we needed. The bed is very comfortable. I slept like a baby. In fact, I didn’t want to leave. It was the perfect getaway for us. Kudos to the host for all of their hard work making this place perfect for their guests. You will not regret your stay here. I highly recommend it!

I am an AirBnb host and I had the pleasure of staying at a this modern cabin in Sevierville that offered the perfect blend of modern comfort and eco-friendly charm. Tucked away in a serene setting, this accommodation provided a refreshing escape from the hustle and bustle, while still being conveniently close to the vibrant attractions of Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg.
From the moment we arrived, we were captivated by the cabin's modern design that seamlessly integrated with its natural surroundings. The large windows allowed for plenty of natural light, providing a warm and inviting atmosphere. The interior boasted contemporary furnishings and amenities, making it a true home away from home. The attention to detail in the décor showcased a commitment to both style and sustainability.
Our stay at this modern and green cabin in Sevierville was nothing short of exceptional.

What can we say? We love it so much here we’ve been back 3 times and many more times to come with our family 🥰 It’s the perfect peaceful get away for locals or for people all over the US! They always make sure all the finishing details on the entire place are perfect even with things to keep our kids happy. We will be booking again for the fall very soon!!!

The oasis retreat was amazing! It’s the cleanest air bnb we’ve ever stayed at. The trails around the cabin are also a really nice feature. It’s secluded enough to feel like you’re by yourself in the mountains but close enough to pigeon forge to easily go out and do anything. It’s such a nice cabin and area. They’ve done an amazing job, and I would recommend this place to anyone! We will definitely be back!

This is a great place to stay…very quiet and peaceful. Close enough to all the great restaurants and shows. We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend here. Marcel was very flexible and even allowed us to check in early.

Our stay was marvelous, the cabin surpassed our expectations. The view was beautiful and the tranquility my family and I experienced was outstanding. Marcel was extremely attentive and made himself accessible throughout our whole stay. We will definitely be returning.

We stayed on December 22-28. It was a spectacular experience. Everything was very clean and organized. The place smelled like new and everything was beautiful luxury and fancy. In this place, you can breathe. Peace is very calm. It's near Pigeon Force and all the attractions. It has excellent definitive location that we have to come back to love this place Marcel responds very quickly and this is a great guest.

Awesome cabin. Modern amenities, Marcel has really thought of everything to make the place comfortable for guests.
We loved the fire pit and used it multiple times.
Our cabin was amazing! It was so clean and cozy! I highly recommend this location!!

Marcel was an amazing host. When we arrived we couldn’t believe how great the place was. He had solid communication and made sure that everything was labeled properly and that we had all we needed for our stay. Super quiet and peaceful and worth the money we paid. We had a great time and will be returning!
Such a cute little place!! It was perfect for a weekend getaway. We loved everything about it! Will definitely go back to this one!!

I'm so happy we chose this place with my husband. Marcel's cottages because that's the name of the owner is in the European style , very clean , modern , in a very quiet and peaceful area surrounded by forest and water . Everything is as it appears in the photos. The marcel is a very nice and friendly person, and after we spoke with him, we had as long as we knew him for a long time . I highly recommend this place for the first time with my husband I was so pleasantly surprised by each other, even our dog, which we had with us, was also happy there. We'll definitely be back this summer . Thanks again, and we'll be sure to recommend this place to our family and friends .

The retreat is very well done! Super cute property and well maintained. We loved the ability to hike each morning. The kitchen is well stocked for cooking and it’s an easy drive into the main attraction areas. It was great ~ would definitely stay again!
We had the best time at Marcels place! The trails were beautiful, he was responsive & everything was so organized & well thought out. We will definitely be back.
Marcel and his cabins are amazing. it is exactly like the pictures. 100% recommended 👌

Absolutely gorgeous A frame! Top of the line amenities in kitchen and bath. Beautiful surroundings with a walking path, a private pond, and each cabin has a private outdoor area with a fire pit and grill. The best part is all of the firewood and supplies you need are provided! This place is a must see! Marcel was a great host, I will definitely be back!
Absolutely amazing. Will be staying here again.
We loved our stay here!

Our stay was wonderful! From lounging by the fire pit to kayaking in the lake, it was better than we ever could have imagined. Marcel also provided several little “extras” that were not expected such as laundry detergent, kcups for the Keurig & hand soaps in both the kitchen & bathroom. Our cabin was extremely clean. My son loved the lake & being able to fish from the kayaks. The area is quiet but also close to town. Our stay was a much needed break from the normal hustle & craziness of our everyday life. We will most definitely be staying with Marcel again. His cabins are a hidden gem in the Smoky Mountains!
This place was perfect for our 3 year anniversary. It's close to many things, but in a quiet, peaceful area with great views.
Great cabin with all the amenities you will need. My children loved the playground area kept them busy in our down time. I would highly recommend this cabin.

Hands down this was the BEST AirBNB we’ve every rented. We stayed here for a week while my husband attended the Cirrus flight school and found it to be so peaceful and a great getaway from Knoxville. Every detail put into the house, design and overall property is so impressive. Marcel thought of every detail, even the organization and fire pit set up. We loved this experience and would definitely recommend and suggest anyone who is looking for a special getaway visit here!

I booked here for my bestfriends FIRST trip to Tennessee!! We absolutely loved it and she had a blast. The place was just as described and matched all the photos. It was very easy to check in and check out, also very easy to adjust the temperature inside (huge deal for us). The set up is adorable, the trails were easy to use and we loved walking them. The distance to Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge is great. We loved being the first to write in the little book about our stay. The bed is also super comfy and the fact it’s a king size is great. We’re already in the works of our next trip back with our boyfriends!

We had a wonderful time at the cabin. We loved the interior design and the trails. We will definitely be back to visit. It was peaceful and quiet. Everything we needed was carefully thought of and in specific locations. Very nicely organized. We enjoyed the fire pit too.
This was a fantastic place. My wife and I have stayed all over the US and Europe during our careers, and this A frame was a truly unique place. We will come back next October

My family loved our stay at Oasis Retreat! The A-Frame cabin had a beautiful view, and it was the perfect size for our family of four. The pictures accurately portrayed the space and amenities. Marcel sent messages with everything we needed to know before our stay, and we never had a need to contact our host with questions or requests. Having a washer/dryer in the cabin was greatly appreciated. We will definitely be back, and we have already recommended Oasis Retreat to friends!
This place was awesome! A real gem near Dollywood. It manages to feel secluded while being completely accessible to all the surrounding towns have to offer.
Great little cabin tucked off the beat and path but still really close to everything in the area. Inside is beautifully decorated and amenities are perfect!

My husband and I came here for a little weekend getaway and it was perfect! It was very clean, quite and private. It was also really close to all the attractions, so it was a good balance between being secluded and being close to town. Definitely would come back!
Such a cute place. So quiet and relaxing. Can’t wait to stay again!!
10/10 would stay again!

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed Marcel’s place !! It was quiet and peaceful and we loved the nature around us. We also loved how the place came with kayaks and fishing poles ! It was a nice peaceful getaway.

Marcel was a great host and always answered quickly and answered all the questions we had. Getting in was super easy and the place was extremely clean. The kitchen had plenty of utensils and cookware to use. We really liked the layout of the place and felt super comfortable. The bed was super comfy and definitely what we needed after a long day. The fountain was beautiful in the lake and making a reservation for the kayaks was super easy. Definitely would recommend a stay here.

This stay was very enjoyable. the cabin was clean, well furnished, and very well designed. the creativity behind the interior was very well placed.
The hiking trails and ponds were great.
This was a great value for the price.

Marcel's place is perfect for a little getaway or a longer stay, and looks exactly the same as in the pictures. The home is surrounded by woods and faces a lake, which provides a peaceful environment. The house has everything that you will need, including modern furniture inside and a well-thought-out outdoor area with a grill, fire pit, and more. The kitchen is also well-equipped, and there is a full-sized washer and dryer available. We loved our stay and are definitely planning to come back in the future.

Marcel was friendly and responded quickly. The cabin was modern, quiet, and cute! Great location for near by attractions. The cabin also had little activities available without traveling such as paddle boating, finishing, and kayaking. 10/10 recommend!

This place sets the bar too high! We are afraid we are not going to be able to enjoy a different Airbnb. The cleanliness was amazing and the amenties were phenomenal! We had a great time beginning the day canoeing and hiking on the property early in the morning and then ending the day around a cozy fire! The cabin went above and beyond our expectations! We enjoyed the cabin and area so much we ended up staying an extra day! Marcel was a great host, always responsive and accommodating. He cared about our needs and made the trip stress free for us. He and his team did a great job with the property!

What an absolutely amazing stay! The fact that this Airbnb was close enough to everything and far enough to enjoy the beauty of the area is wonderful. It was perfect for our small family and we took advantage of all that Marcels place had to offer. We cannot wait to come back in the fall!!
Absolutely beautiful place! Very clean cozy and peaceful!

recently stayed at this beautiful cabin, and I must say it was a fantastic experience. The cabin itself was gorgeous and spacious, providing more than enough room for everyone in our group to feel comfortable. The highlight of the property was definitely the patio - a peaceful and serene spot to hang out, relax, and enjoy the surrounding nature.
The location of the cabin was perfect for our needs. It was just a short 40-minute drive to Cape Cod, making it easy for us to explore the area's beaches and attractions. Additionally, its proximity to Pigeon Forge was a pleasant surprise, as we were able to explore this charming town without much hassle.
One of the great features of this property is the availability of small hikes right on the premises. This allowed us to enjoy nature without having to venture too far from the cabin. It's an excellent addition for those who love the outdoors.
The cabin is so cute! The hiking trails were amazing it even has cute benches for you to rest! Would highly recommend!

One of the best Airbnbs we’ve stayed at, and it’s easily one of my favorite ones as well. Perfect for a family looking to connect with nature. Beautiful trails, lake, and luxurious amenities just as describe in the listing. Marcel’s response time and communication was perfect as well! Looking forward to future stays!!!

This was a fantastic place for me and my two boys. A private location that’s very close to the main highway. A super fast and responsive host that is more than willing to help in any way! Great pond for fishing and just a great atmosphere overall. Highly recommend and will be staying here in the future! Thank you so much!

Was not disappointed,Very,very,very, cute, Country living at its best. Very.
Clean, Hot Tub was very clean, I could not get over how cute and Quiet it was. You will not be disappointed. Robert and Jessica was very Helpful, Thank you so much, we will be staying again ❤️

We enjoyed our stay here. The cabin was clean, and super cozy. The hot tub was very relaxing and we loved the view from it of the stars in the sky at night. The patio area was done so thoughtfully outside for comfort and a complete "get lost in the moment" vibe. The small kitchenette was perfect and equipped with all the basics for a small , yet delicious meal.

"Everything was perfect. The only issue I had was the amount of cobwebs near the hot tub, so I swept them away myself. Considering it's the woods in Tennessee, spraying spider spray around the deck all 12 months of the year may help. That's being nitpicky though! It was a great stay."
It was a great one day get away with my 6 year old son who loved the pool and hot tub
Absolutely loved the place. Quiet and peaceful. Perfect size for my family and my girls loved the pool! Would definitely stay again!
We enjoyed our stay at Tiffany’s place. There were a lot of great amenities. The location was beautiful. The home itself was pretty close to the listing description. Overall, we had a good stay.

The cabin and pool were outstanding. It was a birthday weekend for two of us, so the price was didn't bother us too much. It is in a local community of cabins and is very well maintained. As long as you have food, you really don't need to go anywhere (swimming, games, Roku, etc.) all there. Clear instructions on how to get in and how to leave it for departure.
Tiffany was a very good host and communicated often with us prior to arrival and just before departure.

Beautiful property and location! Very happy with our stay. We very much enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Additionally, everything was well secured with a toddler in the home. Witnesses beautiful weather here and couldn’t recommend it more. Thanks for the great stay!
Beautiful place! Nice location. Loved the hot tub and pool and kitchen was fully stocked with anything you might need! Very friendly hosts as well.
Cabin was great! We really enjoyed the hot tub and pool. Great location. Would definitely stay here again.
Very neat spot in a good central location. Pool was great for the kids! Would recommend this spot to others!
great place to stay. loved the hot tub. quiet neighborhood.
Great location
Great cabin! Our kids were in heaven with the pool, hot tub, and game machine. Struggled to get them to leave the cabin to go do anything else in the area.
Had a great time. Great location. Nice clean place.
Tiffany was a GREAT Host! Very responsive & helpful!
My fiancée and I had an amazing time together celebrating our anniversary in Tennessee, especially in this amazing place. It felt like home and cozy having the tub around. I can’t wait to go back.
Amazing stay!!! It’s in a perfect location! The place is so nice, we loved the indoor pool! It’s updated, Apple TV, clean, and perfect for a small family. Highly recommend!
Nice location. Clean. Loved the hot tub & pool!

This place felt like home! The attention to detail made it feel like home. The kitchen was clean and sticked with essential items. There were games to play, hand soap ( a must).The hot tub was hot and ready for us to get in. We loved the double deck. We actually loved everything! We arrived one day prior to pool cleaning but signs were posted and we were aware that they were coming. We did have an issue but it was addressed immediately, within 5 minutes. We are already planning on going again next year! I highly recommend!

Our family oved the location and cabin! We would definitely stay again. My two year old loved the pool and arcade game the cabin had to offer. It was also close distance to all pigeon forge had to offer.

Although it is located in a "Cabin Resort" it is very quiet, very private and stocked with everything you need to enjoy time with the family in mountains. We loved the option of a hot tub and our kids loved the option of an indoor pool. We were surprised at how close it was to almost everything! The location is dead center of what we dubbed 'The Mountain Trifecta" :) - close to Pigeon Forge, Sevierville, and Gatlinburg. Look forward to visiting again.
BTW, we arrived a little early and met the cleaning crew, what a nice bunch of folks that do a bang up job- thanks again!
Great spot to get away for the weekend
Amazing place to stay and alot of fun activities around to do.
Wonderful place ! No complaints.
This home was stunning and exactly as described! I couldn't have found a nicer place for the price!!
Lots of fun! Thanks, Tiffany!

It could have been a nightmare. Weather was bad, ice and snow on the ground and a lot of things closed, including the cleaning crew. Received a call from Patrick on our way up letting us know. Suggested we stop by the store to pick up extra essentials just in case we got in and couldn’t get back out. We did so, got to the cabin, and even though the cleaning crew was not able to get there, house was clean. He told us where extra sheets were and all we had to do was wash towels. Patrick checked in with me numerous times over the weekend to make sure everything was ok. House was great. Perfect location. We definitely would recommend this cabin to anyone. We look forward to checking out their other cabins in the area.

Definitely recommend staying here super close to pigeon forge and Tennessee! Great location ! Offer everything you could possibly need in the cabin. We got snowed in for 2 days but had plenty to do in the cabin !
Great place, clean, hot tub was nice, pool was awesome! Definitely would stay again!

This place is adorable and had plenty of games and things to do. Very close to Pigeon Forge! The pool and pool area was a little cold but we were still able to swim and have a great time. I would def stay again ❤️

We had a blast here! The place was perfect for our two year old and he especially loved the pool. The location was also great for us. It was private and gave us a taste of the Smoky Mountains but it was also close enough to the surrounding towns where we did not feel like we were driving too much. Overall we had a wonderful time and the hosts were very friendly and easy to work with!
Amazing stay! The hosts were nice and welcoming. The home is unique and the location/views are incredible. We felt right at home and would love to return.
Beautiful, peaceful slice of Heaven on the water! Very clean and well worth the money. Great hosts!

Absolutely incredible stay in the lighthouse - we loved it and will be back again! The atmosphere was phenomenal and peaceful and the perfect getaway. The place was clean and excellent. Certainly the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in.

Planned a birthday getaway for my wife and this place was beyond amazing! Not sure how to put into words as to how beautiful and peaceful it was!! We can say, we WILL be coming back again! Thank you Amy for hosting us and we look forward to coming back for a longer stay!

Betsy and Trey were the best Hosts of the lighthouse stay! The area is beautiful, peaceful and serene right on the lake. I shared with Betsy prior that this stay was a gift to my parents for their anniversary. She went above and beyond to make their stay so special. There was an amazing anniversary basket on the counter when they arrived, along with some farm fresh eggs from the chickens they raise! Such a nice surprise! The lighthouse is super cute and cozy. The top level has the best view of the lake and great space to kick back and relax. Betsy made this such a special stay for my parents and created new favorite memories for them! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Highly recommend!
Exceeded expectations!!

Staying at the Lighthouse was truly a dream. My husband I had a wonderful, peaceful, and restful stay. The lake views were picturesque and we loved every minute of our stay. Betsy and Trey were so helpful and kind, and we were really able to relax and escape. We also loved the chickens, sweet dogs and goats! We will never forget our time here- truly magical!
The light house and the property are gorgeous. A very relaxing and peaceful place to get away for a few days.

Stayed here for our anniversary. Very peaceful and private location. 15 minute drive from downtown Sevierville. Hosts were very nice and helpful. Would love to visit back when the lake is in open season. Thank you again!

My husband and I had the most wonderful stay. If you’re looking for a quiet escape this is it. The lighthouse is beautifully built and decorated, comfortable, quiet and inspiring. The surrounding property is gorgeous as well. We had the best time wondering around the little peninsula, lounging in the sunroom and watching the gulls at sunset. Any was a thoughtful communicative host. This is airbnb done right. We can’t wait to go back!
Great place. perfect views. nice comfy place to do our 10 year anniversary

This place is simply amazing. I’ve stayed at several BNB’s over the last couple of years. Overall with lovely experiences had. With research and time invested, this is probably true for you as well. (Which is why you are reading this review.) Let me say the Lighthouse met and exceeded all of my expectations! Believe this 5-star rating and book it! You will not be disappointed. There’s a peace found here that is utterly magical. We didn’t feel like we were vacationing at a rented space but rather we felt home. We were transported to a place and time where we looked out of our kitchen window to view a lake nestled at the base of the mountain. We walked along its shoreline to the sounds of shore rock crunching beneath our feet. We read on the couch as the light streamed in through the surrounding top floor windows. Betsy and Trey were incredible hosts. One mention of anything you were looking for was received with instructions to it or it placed sweetly at your doorstep. Book it!

We had been really looking forward to the experience in this light house for months (since we booked it) & we were absolutely thrilled with our time there. It did not disappoint one bit. First of all – the 3rd floor 360° room was spectacular! We spent as much time as we could in that space. We watched sunsets & changing weather from there. It was glorious to check out the seagulls & herons flying over the lake. Because it was winter, Douglas Lake had been drawn down so we were able to walk the shoreline, which would be the lake bottom during the warmer months. We were so fortunate to have beautiful warm and dry weather while we were there, up until the last evening when we watched the rain fall & noticed the lake level rise from the previous day. We enjoyed meeting the goats & chickens during one of our walks on the property. We also saw a small group of deer near the waters edge too. We felt immersed in the whole lighthouse experience- which was something I had wanted for a long time.
If you're looking for a quiet getaway with beautiful views, you've found it. This lighthouse is perfect. Thanks for having us.

Driving upon the lighthouse at the end of the day was magical. The setting is beautiful. A great place to stay to relax and recharge. Other than going out to get supplies, we stayed in and enjoyed the surrounding area with hikes, great views and nature. We saw birds and ducks. We would have missed the deer if our host had not alerted us that they were in front of the house. Did not want to leave, it was so peaceful. Would love to return in the summer to take full advantage of the lake.
Gorgeous lake and Mountain views. Resident egg-laying chickens and adorable goats. Lovely hosts. Proactive letting us know of inclement weather before arriving.
Absolutely amazing!! Beautiful beyond belief!! We loved everything about this place! One of our all time favorites ❤️

We absolutely loved it here! The views were amazing and the location is just so peaceful. The lighthouse itself is beautiful. We loved watched the sun rise and set from the front deck. We wish we could’ve stayed longer, but we hope to be back! Highly recommend!
The lighthouse was beautiful, the area was quiet & peaceful-the perfect little escape for our one year wedding anniversary. Amy was super kind & helpful. We loved our time here!

The lighthouse is so peaceful! The sunrises and sunsets are stunning at the top. Amy and her husband are the kindest people and they did an incredible job with the lighthouse. When we arrived it was clean and Amy’s instructions to find the lighthouse were super helpful. We will definitely be back!

The lighthouse is a beautiful retreat! The hosts were very attentive and made great suggestions for places to visit and shared their favorite restaurants. We felt right at home and very welcome—will definitely return!
We will forever refer to the lighthouse as Gods Land! We had a wonderful time, we disconnected from the world and reconnected with each other.

The Lighthouse!! What an extra special place! It’s more than a place, it’s a feeling of peace and calmness for your soul. The owners were very friendly and responded very quickly to any questions we had. Unfortunately our stay was cut short due to a medical emergency at home but we definitely will be back. If you have any doubt about this place, don’t. BOOK it! Your soul will thank you.

This was my first time staying at the Light House in TN and I was filled with joy at the entire experience! I booked the house at the last minute for a trip with my son and from the moment we pulled onto the gravel drive and saw the silly goats we were filled with anticipation at what was in store! Let me tell you, when we slowly took that last left and took our first look at the Light House I stopped the car and immediately took a picture to remember that moment. It's truly such a SPECIAL place. The rocky shores, the secluded location, the safety of a private property, the views ... 100% worth it. My 4 year old told me on day one that this was already an 11/10 vacation and I could not have agreed more! I will absolutely be booking the Light House again as soon as possible. Thank you so much to the wonderful hosts! You have built a truly special home and the intention and love that you put into this special place is clearly evident. I was honored to be able to stay here!
What an amazing 2 days. Hated leaving the beautiful Lighthouse and serene lake. Would definitely recommend.

Our stay at Hunkerdown Hollow couldn’t have been any better. The lighthouse was beautifully built and the views were unbeatable. And the farm fresh eggs provided were just an added bonus! Betsy and Trey are super nice and responsive to any issues or questions you may have. And their little farm is just the cutest! Definitely going to keep this one for a return trip!
Wonderful every way possible except for we had to leave. Perfect getaway with gorgeous views. Loved floating on the lake, star gazing and drinking coffee on the deck!
We had a wonderful stay! The lighthouse was so cozy and the view from every window was beautiful.

The lighthouse was the perfect place for us to celebrate our 19th Anniversary! Beautiful views everyway you turn. So peaceful. Our favorite spot was the table near the grill. Trey was always a text away if we had any questions. We loved using the canoe to go around the coves. We also got to visit the sweet goats and chickens! The house was extremely clean and had a fully stocked kitchen with anything you may need to cook. We will be back!

Awesome place.
Can’t wait to go back!

What an incredible stay! One of the best Air Bnbs we have stayed at.
Lots to do nearby - we explored Smoky Mountain National Park, Dollywood, and went white water rafting. However, the views from the front deck and the pristine accommodations made it hard to leave.
Very hospitable, gracious, and helpful hosts.
We spent a week here and wish it could have been longer.
We arrived after dark, and though it would be preferable to arrive in daylight, the hosts provided clear directions and even left the light on for us.
Highly recommend!

This place is like a slice of paradise tucked away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Nestled on a serene lake, the view from the lighthouse is like something out of a dream or the best Hallmark movie you’ve ever seen! Pictures do no justice to the calming energy you feel here! A big shout out to the charming residents of Hunkerdown Hollow: the goats and chickens! They're basically the unofficial welcoming committee, and they do it in style!
Amy, our amazing host, deserves a crown for hospitality - always one step ahead of our needs to the point I think she’s a mind reader! After spending time at Hunkerdown Hollow, I can confirm that it's not just a place; it's a feeling. A feeling of true rest, where the world's chaos takes a vacation and leaves you in peace. So, if you're looking for a dose of tranquility, a dash of laughter (goats are surprisingly funny), and a heap of amazing memories, pack your bags and make your way to Airbnb Hunkerdown Hollow. Your soul will thank you!

One of the best AirBnBs, I have stayed in. absolutely beautiful location and peaceful on the lake. Plenty of space that made it feel very private. Amy (Betsy) & Trey are very friendly and gave us plenty of recommendations!
Very Highly recommend!!

We had a wonderful time! The lighthouse was exactly as described and the hosts were very responsive and friendly. The scenery and lake are gorgeous, and it was great to watch the sunrise and sunset each day.

The lighthouse was everything I expected and so much more. The setting was beautiful, relaxing and refreshing. My husband and I had a great time. We arrived on our first night and we’re treated with fireworks while seated on the third floor! Thank you Trey for the tip! We will definitely be back to visit again!

The lighthouse is a beautiful and one of a kind location. The interior is immaculate and the exterior is beautiful with 360 views. The view from the 3rd floor is breathtaking. Amy and Trey are amazing hosts and are extremely helpful and proactive with any needs you may have.

What a beautiful gem the lighthouse on the lake is!! Amy (Betsy) & Trey are wonderful hosts! They made our family feel so welcomed. They reached out multiple times before our trip, answered any questions we had and provided photos to make sure we understood how to get to the lighthouse. The property is absolutely stunning!! Our boys had the best time fishing, swimming and watching the boats on the lake. The inside of the lighthouse is equally spectacular- shiplap, a gorgeous kitchen and the third floor has the most breathtaking views! We all left sad that we had to go home! Looking forward to planning our next getaway at the lighthouse!

We had a fantastic week at the lighthouse! The home is beautiful, clean and private. Overall, the lighthouse was a perfect peaceful retreat. We spent all day soaking in the sun, sitting in the water, birdwatching and relaxing. Definitely a stay for those who are more physically capable as there are lots of stairs to contend with, but definitely worth it if you are able! The lighthouse was a delightful home away from home, and the hosts are so wonderful as well!

What an amazing place! It is perfect for anyone who wants to getaway from the crowds of Pigeon Forge or Gatlinburg. Beautiful lake, wonderful deck to enjoy the outdoors, and a gorgeous place to stay. Betsy (aka Amy) and Trey are such wonderful hosts and they have thought of everything a guest might need. My husband and I had such an amazing time during our week in Tennessee. I highly recommended the hosts and this incredible lighthouse!

Amy and her family were wonderful hosts! This property provided us with an outstanding break from our routine. We especially enjoyed the unlimited access to great fishing and beautiful views on the lake. Gracious hosts and wonderful atmosphere of their home, exceeded all of our expectations and will be recommending this to friends and family.

The lighthouse is simply MAGICAL! We loved the 360 views, the sunrise and sunset views, the lake. There are kayaks available for use. Although we did not fish, it would have been a great fishing spot! The grounds are beautifully maintained. The location is just private enough and only a short drive from tons of activities, including Dollywood!

This place was extremely peaceful and relaxing. The road to the place was curvy and hilly, but after we arrived we didn’t want to leave! It was so close to the Smokies, Pigeon Forge, restaurants, etc. Amy was very responsive to our call about sweet Daisy’s visit (her elderly bulldog that gave us a visit). We intend to visit again!
Beautiful sunrise and sunsets. Very peaceful and private.
It’s absolutely beautiful and Betsy and Trey were extremely helpful! The drive is a little rough for a smaller car but other than that we enjoyed our stay!
Easily the best stay we have had at any AirBnB! This lighthouse was perfect for our family of 4. Stunning views and gorgeous decor. Such a beautiful and unique stay nestled in the smoky mountains.

This was our 1st Airbnb and it set the bar so high for future bookings! The lighthouse and views were so beautiful and relaxing. It was the perfect anniversary get away. Trey & Betsy were so inviting and kind, we appreciated them sharing this slice of heaven with us…also enjoyed their dogs :)

The host was not only extremely flexible but also so accommodating to our situation. She offered to help get a photographer arranged for my proposal as well as to get champagne and anything else I needed. Her and her family were so helpful and kind. I the location and lighthouse were so beautiful and secluded and I would recommend to any small families or especially couples looking to get away for a few days to enjoy nature and a beautiful home!

This was a great place to stay. Very peaceful and right next to the lake. Waking up to nothing but the sound of Canadian geese and little waves on the shoreline and the sun glistening off the water. The lighthouse was as beautiful as described in the listing. Great place to unwind and just enjoy nature, but not too far away from Sevierville. Definitely worth a second visit and more! Amy was a great host and we were glad we got to meet her in person as well. She helped us with directions and pictures on how to get to the lighthouse. Definitely an 11 out of 10 for this listing!

Amy was an amazing host. So gracious and kind! She even decorated for Valentine’s Day and left us a little treat. The lighthouse was absolutely beautiful and had everything we could need and the views and surroundings make it so worth it in itself. I will definitely be staying here again!

This place is absolutely magical and easily one of the best Air BnB experiences we’ve had. The lighthouse is incredible; a water view from every window, nicely decorated, super clean, and completely relaxing. The lighthouse is private, has direct access to the water and island, and the view of the lake and surrounding mountains is endless. Our host was so welcoming, kind, and communicative. She truly made us feel like family. She invited us to feed their goats, explore their property, and she even hung a banner in the lighthouse for my husband’s birthday. There is so much love and thought put into this property and it definitely shows. We are already planning to come back again this year and would 100% recommend it to family, friends, or anyone who is seeking an amazing retreat to a very unique location.
Beautiful property!!
Beautiful place and very peaceful. I’d only suggest driving a truck or suv. A sports car could be tricky

Our stay was nothing short of amazing!! From the cozy cabin feel to the fantastic view.. The view was priceless I must add!! Check-in was simple. Amy was prompt to answer the few questions I had. The place was stocked with many supplies as well. My only regret is not having more time to stay. 100% sure we will be coming back to this paradise to experience the beautiful lake when it’s warm enough to swim and enjoy the canoe/kayaks. Amy was so gracious to have allowed us to utilize the washer/dryer set and for that I was i incredibly grateful!! My 19yo daughter was disappointed there was no TV. The point of staying there was to get away anyways, so it didn’t bother us one bit. There was Wi-Fi to connect our devices to so that was an easy fix. You’d think being way out that connection would be an issue but it wasn’t at all. Oh and very important to me, the bed was PERFECT!!! A good nights sleep is very important and was just that, perfect!

Legend has it that when Adam and Eve were kicked out of the garden of Eden, they searched the earth for the next most idyllic spot. Where did they land??? The Hunkerdown Hollow lighthouse! This lighthouse ON ITS OWN ISLAND is three stories of pure bliss. There’s a full-size kitchen, dining area and bathroom on the first floor, a large bedroom on the second floor and a gorgeous loft hang out area on the third floor with views for miles and miles. I am currently sitting on the front deck while listening to ZERO sounds of humanity. During the summer you will have some boats on the lake but otherwise, sit, relax and let your blood pressure recede to zero… because you’ll think you’ve died and gone to heaven. Take a walk through the woods to the end of the island, go swimming in the lake, go fishing, kayaking or just sit and listen to the sounds of the earth as God intended them. Don’t bring a phone. Don’t bring a computer. Just exist here and let all your stress melt away. Oh, and if you are coming here with your significant other, I would highly recommend not bringing any clothing either. There’s not a soul in sight! You’re welcome, humanity.
My stay was excellent !!
Beautiful relaxing fun great place to hear and see nature. This cabin has it all. I would definitely come back. My kids had so much fun. Close to town.

This place is amazing!! Brain was a super host and had a lot of good ideas for things to do. This is the perfect place to explore the Smokys. We saw deers by the house. Everthing was so good, the jacuzzi and playroom and perfect beds. I would defenitly come back to this place!

Phenomenal Cabin nestled in the hills of TN. Simply amazing views from the porch, especially in the morning while enjoying our morning coffee.
Thank you! it was great.

This cabin is amazing! It’s in a nice neighborhood and has amazing views. Brian was a great owner and very responsive with a minor issue we had. We would definitely suggest this cabin to friends and would stay here again when we return to the area.

The view is beautiful and has the cabin has two decks plus large windows to take in the mountain scenery. There are many cabins nearby; however this one is on the end of a row, making it feel more private. The view is not obstructed by any of the other cabins. It was clean and the beds were very comfortable. The games were a fun added touch. We had an issue with the HVAC but the host promptly responded and someone came out to fix the issue, even though it was late in the evening. There was a lack of amenities such as toilet paper, coffee, and cooking supplies. Overall though the experience was good with a beautiful view, peaceful setting, and conveniently near Pigeon Forge. Would stay there again.
Great cabin! We loved every minute of being there. Everything was great, highly recommend!
Beautiful home. We had the best vacation. We will definitely be back. Thank you Brian 😊
Amazing view. The kids had a blast with all the games, their own space, and a hot tub on the deck!

This cabin was everything we expected and more! It was our first time in the Smokey’s and we were far from disappointed! It was almost hard to leave the beautiful porch with the picturesque view and cozy cabin. Very clean and tidy all around. Brian was extremely responsive and gracious. We would highly recommend for anyone who wants to check out the Smokey’s!

After agonizing over hundreds of places to stay we chose this one. I am so glad we did! I was looking for privacy which seemed hard to do on a mountain full of cabins. Brian’s place is at the end of the road and has a very private feel from the hot tub and porches. The loft area and games were perfect for the kids and the mountain view from that upstairs bed is outstanding! Cabin had everything we needed and Brian was a perfect host and was very helpful and responsive. Drive time to pigeon forge and gatlinburg was very easy and didn’t take long at all. Stop searching and book this one, you will not regret it!

I would give this place way more than 5 starts if I could. First off, let me start by saying the pictures of the view do not do it justice. Its so much more in-person. You can see the entire area from Legacy Mountain, over-top of Gatlinburg, into the National park mountains. This cabin sits at the end of the road and is very private. There is only one other cabin close, but the way the cabin faces, you don't even really know its there. The balconies and hot tub offer a private, amazing view.
