Wonderful experience. We would stay there again.

A cute cabin off the beaten path but yet still close to all the attractions. The kisses on the pillows, the smores kit on the table and the welcome sign were all nice touches to make sure we felt at home. Everything was clean and we didn't need much other than a few groceries. Everything else was readily available. My 2 kids had so much fun that they hated to leave. We will definitely be back again soon!

The cabin is cozy. It needs a little TLC, which the owners reported in the details. The one thing they did not report was the A/C can not keep up in the evenings. We left the Cabin in the morning with thermostat set on 70, came back at 5:00 and the thermostat was put to 77 (nobody in our family set it that high, so we figured someone came in and raised it while we were out) the temperature in the cabin when we returned from our excursions at 5pm was at 86 degrees. At 10:45 PM the temperature was at 75 degrees. Made for a long night. Supper was not cooked. If you don’t mind these conditions, this Cabin is for you. Book it and enjoy your stay!

A very beautiful cabin right near the greatest tourist attractions. Had an amazing stay with nice cozy comfort. Ron and Sheilah were amazing and kind. Very understanding. This is definitely the cabin you want to stay at while visiting Tennessee discovering Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge
Quiet area away from high traffic areas and tourist areas.
Amazing place, clean, perfect peaceful location, not too far from all the fun. We will love to stay there again!

Great retreat from busy days in Gatlinburg! Surrounded by nature and peace and quiet. Comfortable beds, clean, and well-stocked kitchen. If you’re looking for a cabin with cozy homey touches (like s’mores supplies), this is the place! It is about a 37 minute drive to Gatlinburg without traffic, but if you leave later in the morning, the drive may take up to an hour. If driving time isn’t a concern, this is a great place for the family to stay.
Great location. The cabin is super cute too.
this was a great place and sheliah and Ron were so easy and quick to communicate. the drive was nice and away from everything yet minutes away from everything. my family and I both really enjoyed it!
This cabin was a great experience it was very cozy and a nice get away for a couple days will definitely like to back

The place was beautiful, clean, and the owners included some lovely kind extras. The downsides were the high cleaning fee added to the cost, and the upstairs loft remained quite hot all night. However we had a nice time!

Was far enough out to feel cozy in the woods but still pretty close to town & attractions at the same time. My six year old loved finding chocolates on his pillow & staying upstairs in the loft. Overall it was a great place to stay!
Thanks for the stay! We had a great time! Hopefully we'll be back next year!
Highly recommend, a very convenient drive to Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. You also get the cabin in the woods experience too. We will definitely stay again.
Everything was perfect and I could not have asked for more! The house is exactly as it is described. Quiet area close to everything that you would want to do there.
Very comfortable home with easy check-in & responsive hosts.

Great! Very clean and comfortable! We enjoyed the quiet area the cabin was located in and the yard space so my husband and 5 year old could practice baseball in the evenings while I strolled with our 2 year old.

The cabin is cute, definitely in need of repairs. I would not stay again for the simple fact of how strange/difficult it was to book. We reserved this cabin, money came out of my bank account and we received an email that it was non refundable which we knew and were okay with. After that we got multiple emails from the owners requiring us to give them detailed explanations of who is staying, why, when we would be in and out and they wanted copies of government issued photo IDs. I felt that I had to comply bc it was non refundable and I didn’t want to just be out all the money we paid. I have never had such an issue booking an air bnb. They did allow us to check in early and the house is in a good location. But I found the emails disturbing not to mention when I stopped answering them the owners oddly enough needed to stop by and get something from the house while we were there. Very very strange but ifyou don’t mind being watched and giving your life story it could be a good place to stay.

We loved our stay at the cabin! Ron and Sheilah were great at communicating with us from booking to check out. The cabin was actually cuter in person. We appreciated all of the personalized touches, such as our names on a chalk board welcoming us, to the cute little smores kit. It was far enough out to enjoy the countryside, but only 15 mins to Pigeon Forge. Overall a great experience!
Cute place to stay and great hosts!!
Sweet little cabin off the beaten path out of the hussle and bustle. Our family enjoyed it very much!

You get what you pay for. It was not cleaned before we checked in. Plastic plates, was not cleaned properly, leftovers in the freezer from another guest, extremely dusty, & holes in the sheets. Will not book here again.

My two friends and I stayed here so that we could hike at the national park and enjoy some of the touristy things in Gatlinburg and we were able to do both from this location. We loved the personal touches from Ron and Sheilah that truly made us feel welcome. It really did feel like we were part of the family. The kitchen was fully stocked and there was everything that we needed. We even picked up some firewood from town and enjoyed a bonfire one night. This may be my favorite AirBnb that I’ve ever stayed at!
As expected no complaints.
Such a nice quiet cabin, but close enough to the attractions. We really loved our time at the cabin, and enjoyed the fire pit. The beds are comfortable and the cabin has everything you need.
Great house right in the middle of pigeon forge and Gatlinburg burg beautiful scenery

Ron and Sheilah were excellent! Communication was great, location was close to town, and the description of the property is accurate. Driveway is steep and gravel as expected. Little outdoor fire pit was nice, even though we didn't use it. The welcome basket of s'mores was also a very nice touch! Plenty of creature comforts to make your cabin stay a little easier without having to go to the grocery store for every little thing like spices, coffee filters, laundry soap, bathroom soaps and shampoos, and things of that nature. If we are looking for a place to stay in the area again, we will definitely keep Ron and Sheilah in mind!
A cute welcome sign with all of our names on it.. And a little snack to make s’mores
A wonderful place to stay at the end of the day, while exploring East Tennessee.
A nice quiet retreat off the beaten path but still close enough to everything.
My wife and I stayed in this cabin for the weekend and it was very nice, clean cabin. The owners were very helpful and communicated with us. I would highly recommend this cabin.

Great cabin and great hosts! My daughter was thrilled with the s’mores set up they provided, as well as the thoughtful touches of the personalized welcome board. Cabin was pretty much fully stocked with everything you could need, well maintained and a very close yet scenic drive to all the local destinations. Thanks again!
Clean, comfortable and all of the amenities you would like to have. We also enjoyed the personal decor.

Ron and Sheila’s cabin was very welcoming and beautiful. They even left Treats, and a s’mores kit for us to use at the cabins fire pit. Over all I think tho cabin was so good for the price and was just lovely to stay at!

Love this cabin! We stayed while on a family road trip headed to the coast. It was a great place to stop and rest and play, we wish we could have stayed longer than just one night! My kids loved the big jetted tub. We loved the big windows and how cozy it all was.

It was perfect! When we walked in we were greeted by a personalized sign giving us a warm welcome into their home! It smelled fantastic due to the oil warmer. The house was well kept and lit up by strands of Christmas lights. Unfortunately, we didn’t get to try the big tub. But, it was definitely enticing! It’s a cozy, homey cabin that we wouldn’t hesitate to come back to!

Our stay was so amazing thanks to Ron and Sheilah for making it that way. Leaving cute little family traditions for us to try such as their own s’mores styles. They provided little snacks! The house was nice and clean, it was absolutely beautiful. We enjoyed it so much and hopefully next year when we come back, we can stay again!
Quiet and cozy. Perfect place for a peaceful weekend!
The cabin was excellent we enjoyed are stay very clean quiet and relaxing

We loved the cabin. We were very surprised at the decorative touches that awaited us. A plate of cookies, Valentine's flowers, lights, tree, chocolate kisses on the pillows, and much more made our experience unforgettable. The cabin is clean, cozy, and quiet. Everything that we wanted for our weekend getaway. We can't wait to go back and stay again.

Staying at Ron and Sheilah’s cabin was phenomenal. The location is prime - it is out in the country away from everything, however, you can get to key locations in only a few minutes. Not only was their cabin beautiful, clean, and cozy, but Ron and Sheilah were amazing hosts. They went out of their way to provide special touches in the cabin, they allowed us to check-in early, and they were even willing to allow us to check out late if we wanted to. My wife and I had a wonderful weekend and would love to return in the future!

What a beautiful cabin! Has a woodsy, rustic decor that is cozy, warm and beautiful. The cabin was impeccably clean and was furnished with nice touches. We enjoyed hanging out by the firepit and talking until late at night. Ron and Sheilah were terrific hosts with quick and prompt communication! Hope we can return in the near future.
Beautiful cabin, in a quiet location, out in the woods !! Close to all attractions and amenities. Ron and Sheila were excellent host and even left goodies !! I would recommend this cabin to all.
This cabin is spacious, has great amenities, and decent location to the Smokies national park. Overall great stay at the cabin.
This house was beautiful and we loved it and it defiantly won’t be the last time we come and stay!!!
Great location and loved the personal touches of s’mores waiting for us when we got there. Super clean and a great getaway close to Pigeon Forge/Gatlinburg.
This cabin is amazing. Great hosts and very good at communicating. I would recommend this for family and anyone looking to get away.
Lovely cabin about 30 minutes from Gatlinburg. Hosts are very responsive and hospitable. We felt very welcome.

Far and away better than expected. This cabin is all we wanted and more. A short, 10 minute trip into the heart of Pigeon Forge, but seems to be a mlion miles removed.
Every detail was attended to and the personal touches put this place over the top. We will be back. We didn't experience any problems but did have to contact the hosts, and their response was immediate.
Clean and very well furnished, and the downstairs bed is AMAZING to sleep on.

We would highly recommend. The cabin was probably one of the cleanest places we have ever stayed in while on vacation. Also all the little things that was done to make us feel welcome like the s’mores basket and cookies and also my kids loved the chocolates on the bed. We look forward to staying there in the future. We also loved that you aren’t right in the middle of town...it was so peaceful and quiet.
Was clean and 15 minutes from the attractions and restaurant
Amazing value and customer service! Highly, highly recommend!
You will not regret staying at this cabin. It is far enough out for peace and quiet but close enough to enjoy all the things.

Sheilah did such a great job with little personal touches. She had a little
S’mores basket for us (with a family tradition of icing in lieu of chocolate bar), our names on a chalkboard, and fresh baked bread. Cabin was spotless and felt very homelike. Would def stay again!
The cabin was lovely and well kept. We appreciated the amenities and look forward to coming back!
Our family had a wonderful time staying in Stephanie’s cabin. Stephanie was very helpful and accommodating. The place is very peaceful and cozy. Looking forward to coming back.

My friend and I embarked on a short three day getaway to go to a Zach Bryan concert. Once we arrived at the cabin we were in awe. The surrounding nature took our breath away and the house was beautiful. We loved it so much we contemplated if we actually even wanted to attend the concert where we had pit tickets and paid a pretty penny! We will definitely be visiting again with family! Thanks for being great hosts!
We truly enjoyed ourselves! The surroundings were serene and peaceful, everything we needed and more!

This was a great stay for my family while celebrating my husband’s birthday. The cabin and the surrounding area is beautiful. Stephanie was always very responsive to questions and was a great host. We will be back again! Thanks!
This cabinet is absolutely beautiful and everything that I expected. Stephanie was a great host. I will definitely rent this cabin or any cabin that Stephanie host again.
Loved the cabin! It was so peaceful and relaxing we ended up canceling evening plans to stay in and soak up the cabin vibes.
Beautiful cabin with a great view. Pictures don’t do it justice! The owners were great communicators and everything was easy to access.

We loved our stay and would stay here again if we revisit the area. The host was extremely communicative before and during our stay. What we loved most was the quiet beautiful space the home provided while also not being far from the chaos of town if that is what you want. Nearby Townsend provided accessibility to the National Park and had some cute locally owned restaurants. The cabin had everything we needed to make it feel like home, including very comfortable beds! We will miss having morning coffee along the creek on the very expansive deck.
Stephanie was very responsive whenever we had questions. The cabin was clean and matched the descriptions listing, we would stay again. No concerns

Beautiful place, very peaceful. Loved the pool table, hot tub and views.
Stephanie was a awesome host!
Stephanie was a wonderful host. The cabin was cozy and we loved enjoying the creek views. Highly recommend for anyone looking to enjoy the national park and other nearby attractions.
Best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had!!!

This cabin and the property it’s situated on is stunning! Stephanie went out of her way to help with tons of suggestions for everything to do, where to eat, hiking trails etc…she responded immediately every time I reached out and was warm and friendly. The deck and creek out back are breathtaking and we will definitely return!

I can’t even begin with how beautiful this home is. It was so cozy and really felt like home. Our favorite was the sound of the river behind the house. It made it sound like rain and just gave us so much peace. The host is so wonderful with responding back. We can’t wait come back.
We enjoyed our stay at Creekside! It was beautiful, and Stephanie was always quick to respond. We can’t wait to come back!

It was an awesome cabin. Me and my husband really enjoyed our stay. The cabin sits by a creek that’s why we picked this cabin. It was so relaxing to sit on the porch in the rocking chairs and look out at the creek. There’s also a walkway out to the creek with seating on the walkway so you could just sit and look at the beautiful creek. The cabin was very clean and had everything that you could need. It’s a secluded and romantic setting. You will definitely enjoy your stay at the cabin and will want to come back again. Stephanie was an excellent host.
Had a wonderful stay and host is very responsive to and issue or concerns you may have 10/10
Beautiful private cabin. Host was extremely helpful and accommodating. Loved it!
This was a great place to stay, very private, beautiful wooded area, but had a comfy feel. Hot tub was great and the theater was enjoyable. Comfy bed!! Would stay again
